Statuswerte
###########

.. workflow status

.. |wf0|        replace:: **New**
.. |wf10|       replace:: |wf_i10| **Execution**
.. |wf20|       replace:: |wf_i20| **Completed**
.. |wf30|       replace:: |wf_i30| **Failed**
.. |wf40|       replace:: |wf_i40| **Discarded**
.. |wf50|       replace:: |wf_i50| **Frozen**
.. |wf_i10|     image:: ../../../workflow_common/icons/status/cdbwf_status_10.png
.. |wf_i20|     image:: ../../../workflow_common/icons/status/cdbwf_status_20.png
.. |wf_i30|     image:: ../../../workflow_common/icons/status/cdbwf_status_30.png
.. |wf_i40|     image:: ../../../workflow_common/icons/status/cdbwf_status_40.png
.. |wf_i50|     image:: ../../../workflow_common/icons/status/cdbwf_status_50.png
.. |wf_i100|    image:: ../../../workflow_common/icons/status/cdbwf_status_100.png

.. workflow template status

.. |wft0|       replace:: **New**
.. |wft20|      replace:: |wf_i20| **Released**
.. |wft40|      replace:: |wf_i40| **Invalid**
.. |wft100|     replace:: |wf_i100| **Review**

.. task status

.. |task0|      replace:: **New**
.. |task10|     replace:: |task_i10| **Execution**
.. |task20|     replace:: |task_i20| **Completed**
.. |task30|     replace:: |task_i30| **Rejected**
.. |task35|     replace:: |task_i35| **Discarded**

.. |formt0|     replace:: **New**
